summary: Places a Player home overlooking Rorikstead.
descriptionHtml:
Sunrise Retreat

Sunrise Retreat is my wife’s house mod just up the hill from Rorikstead.  She made it specifically to her tastes and for her needs.  Sunrise Retreat is a smaller, lore friendly home that has all of the crafting amenities, a library, and places for the horse and dog.  This home is follower friendly and all of the containers both inside and outside are safe and do not respawn. It is fully furnished with a few rooms and finished basement and no loading screens. Also a working Mara and Arkay shrine. The key is hidden on the property of this pretty gem.

======
This is my wife’s first ever mod for ANY game she has ever played. She learned the CK, watched videos, and worked on this for 2 weeks just because she wanted “her” house for Skyrim. I am so proud of her.

The house is modeled after Honeyside, but that is where the similarities stop. She has scoured over every inch of this home inside and out. Attention to detail was a foremost, fixing any little bug she can find, tweaking this and that. She has even gone and recreated the outside part of the house from scratch! Why, because some times the house would show up, sometimes not, even with LOD checked, also the default Honeyside model has a roofed style skylight, which the inside does not reflect.
This was a joy for her, sometimes frustrating, and a joy for me to watch her mod for the first time.

====
Note from my Wife :)
Hello everyone!  E2B2’s wife here and I’d like to personally thank you all for your support of my very first mod!  My main goal is to make my house feel like a functional, modest home where you have a reason to move through the rooms and enjoy the view on the way.  Of course I have an ace up my sleeve, so to speak, because I’m able to bounce my ideas off my very loving and supportive husband whom I absolutely adore.
====

Mods in screenshots:
FXAA Vanilla Enhanced by jellinn (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=384)
   or
FXAA Post Process Injector by some_dude Option 3 (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=131)
Sexy Riften v2 by horrorview (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7241)
Sexy Villages and Towns by horrorview (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7583)
Colorful Lights - No Shadows - More FPS by TRoaches (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10789)
And a Big thank you to Modders Resource-Weapon Racks-Bookshelves-Plaques-Mannequins by Eldiabs (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11618)

v1.00: Release
v1.01: Front Door Fixed. Placed Bones on the Dog Bed. Put a Safe in the Bedroom.
v1.02: Noticed a minor offset in a interior wall causing a sliver of \"void\" to be visible.

Bug:
Creepy mannequin strikes a pose.
author: E2B2
